name: post-paymentInstrumentGroups
description: Creates a payment instrument group to associate and group payment instrument resources together. You can apply a transaction rule to a payment instrument group.

balancePlatform.description: The unique identifier of the [balance platform](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/balanceplatform/latest/get/balancePlatforms/{id}__queryParam_id) to which the payment instrument group belongs.

description.description: Your description for the payment instrument group, maximum 300 characters.

properties.description: Properties of the payment instrument group.

reference.description: Your reference for the payment instrument group, maximum 150 characters.

txVariant.description: The tx variant of the payment instrument group.
